title: Enhancing Patient Care Competencies: Competency-Based Mathematical Simulation Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (fractions, ratios, elementary statistics)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate mathematical decision-making skills with 80% accuracy through work scenario-based VR simulations.
Learners can design personalized learning pathways using a competency checklist and revise/improve them at least three times.
Learners demonstrate work problem-solving competencies (data analysis/budget planning) in final projects through peer and summative evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
